Department of Microbiology

   The P.G Department of Microbiology had its genesis in 1988. It currently harbors a well equipped laboratory with several amenities. Several scholars have utilised the esteemed laboratories and the statewide expertise of the staff for their M.Phil.,M.D.(Siddha)and Ph.D., works. The thrust areas of the ongoing research programs in the department encompasses fields of Bioleaching, Pollution Ecology, Enteric Microbiology, Probiotics, Enzymology, Bioremediation and Biodegradation,Biofertilisers,Diseases of the Eye, Microbial Corrosion and Food Microbiology. The department has completed 2 major projects besides 7 student schemes. Five training programs in Microbiology, Immunology and Microbial Genetics have been conducted for the students and teaching faculties and 5 training manuals are brought out.
